column3: なんだおまえは？　あ？　レオの使い？
column4: Who are you? Huh? Leo's messenger?

column3:
おい、声を低く――奴らに聞かせるな
――それで、なんの用だ
column4:
Hey, lower your voice - don't let them hear you.
So, what do you want?

column3: 撤収？　はん！レオめ――
column4: Withdraw? Hmph! Leo!

column3:
あいつは昔からそうだ
自信たっぷりな態度で間違えやがる
column4:
That person has always been like that, making
mistakes with a confident attitude.

column3: おい、何をコソコソ――
column4: Hey, what are you whispering about?

column3: 騎士団風情に聞かせる話なんぞないわ！
column4:
I have no stories to tell that would impress the
Knightly Order!

column3:
その言葉、聞き捨てならない！
あんたも元は騎士だろう？
column4:
That word, I can't ignore it! Were you also once
a Knight?

column3: ならば――
column4: If so, then...

column3:
んな昔のことは忘れたぜ！
もう５０年前だからな！
column4:
I've forgotten about such ancient things!
It's already been 50 years!

column3: いやいやいや――
column4: No, no, no...

column3:
確かに俺がいた頃の騎士団は
誇り高き戦闘集団だった
column4:
Indeed, the Knight's Order back when I was there
was a proud and elite combat unit.

column3: ところが、今の騎士団はどうだ！？
column4: However, how is the current Knight's Order!?

column3: ――言ってみろ
column4: - Try saying it.

column3: 口先だけの腰抜け集団だって言ってるんだよ！
column4:
I'm saying they're a group of cowards who only
talk big!

column3:
な？　魔物討伐の優先権があるってなら
さっさとやっつけろよ！
column4:
Huh? If there's a priority for slaying monsters,
then hurry up and defeat them already!

column3:
何度も倒している！
しかし、倒しても、また現れるのだ
column4:
I have defeated it many times!
However, no matter how many times I take it down,
it keeps reappearing.

column3:
どこかに巣窟があり、そこを叩かねば
ならないと協議しているところへ貴様が来て――
column4:
There is a nest somewhere, and we must strike it.
And just as we were discussing this, you came――

column3: ほら来た言い訳騎士団！
column4: Here comes the excuse-making Knight Order!

column3: くっ――
column4: Hmph...

column3: 今度はなんだ？　奴らに聞かせるなよ
column4: What is it this time? Don't let them hear you.

column3:
なんだと！？
魔物を倒しただって？
column4:
What did you say!?
You defeated the enemy?

column3: 今、なんと言った？
column4: What did you just say?

column3:
騎士団さんよ、人が悪いぜ
魔物はすっかり倒したらしいじゃねえか
column4:
Hey, knights! Cut the slack. It seems the
monsters are all defeated.

column3:
ったく！
おれたちは帰る！　ああ、帰るぞ！
column4:
Seriously! We're going back! Yeah, we're going
back!

column3: なんの話だ――
column4: What are you talking about...

column3: おまえ、騎士団副長のハインツだろ？
column4: Are you the vice captain of the Knights, Heinz?

column3:
そこまで出世するってのは
よほど話のわかる奴に違いねえ
column4:
To achieve such success, one must truly
understand the ways of the world.

column3:
だから、ここの魔物を退治したのは
あんたか部下の誰かってことにしておけ
column4:
So, let's just say that you or one of your
subordinates took care of defeating the enemies
here.

column3: それから新入り、おまえ――
column4: And you, the newcomer...

column3:
いろいろ文句はあるだろうが全部飲み込め
疑問も飲み込め
column4:
There may be various complaints, but swallow them
all.
Swallow your doubts as well.

column3:
ここにいる全員、おまえの手柄は忘れない
だが、公式には騎士団が倒したことにする
column4:
Everyone here will never forget your achievement,
but officially, we'll credit the knighthood for
defeating it.

column3: いいな？
column4: Isn't it nice?

column3: はん！　その手には乗るか！
column4: Hah! Will you fall for that trap?!

column3:
恩を売りつけようというのか？
貸しを作っておこうという魂胆か！？
column4:
Are you trying to sell me your favor?
Or is your intention to create a debt!?

column3: ハインツ！
column4: Heinz!

column3: はっ！
column4: Hah!

column3:
怒声が木々に響き渡っているが――
揉め事ではないだろうな
column4:
The angry voice echoes through the trees, but it
doesn't seem like a quarrel.

column3:
信じられないことだが、騎士と見れば
因縁をつける志の低い覚者もいるようだ
column4:
It's hard to believe, but there are some
low-minded Arisen who pick fights with Knights at
the slightest provocation.

column3: まさか挑発に――
column4: I didn't mean to provoke anyone!

column3: とんでもありません！
column4: No, not at all!

column3:
騎士団長さんよ、信じてやりな
こいつはおれたちの不作法をいさめただけだ
column4:
Oh, Captain of the Knights, please believe me.
This person merely reprimanded our rudeness.

column3:
ハインツたち、いい仕事をしたぜ？
魔物はもういない――静かなもんだ
column4:
Heinz and the others, did a great job, huh?
The enemies are gone now... It's so peaceful.

column3:
――ほう
任務はすでに完了したというのか
column4:
Oh, is it true that the mission has already been
completed?

column3:
ふむ――
レオから報告を受けて慌ててここへ来たが
column4:
Hmm――
I hurriedly came here upon receiving a report
from Leo, but...

column3:
取り越し苦労だったようだな
では、一同、神殿へ戻るがいい
column4:
It seems that we were overly worried.
Well then, everyone, let us return to the Temple.

column3: よし、じゃあ、覚者も解散だ！
column4:
Alright, then. It's time for the Arisen to
disband as well!

column3:
お疲れだったな
特におまえ――よくこらえた、いい根性だ
column4:
You must be exhausted.
Especially you - you endured well.
You have great willpower.

column3: おや――
column4: Oh...

column3:
こんなところで――
奇遇だな
column4:
In a place like this...
What a coincidence.

column3: ――いや
――なるほど
column4: ――I see.

column3:
我々白騎団の捜索だけでは
心許ない――
column4:
We cannot rely solely on our White Knights search
efforts—

column3: ジョゼフ殿のご判断か
column4: Is that Lord Joseph's decision?

column3: ――ふむ
column4: Hmm, I see.

column3:
ともあれ、メイリーフ嬢は
このあたりにはいない
column4: Anyway, Lady Mayleaf is not around this area.

column3:
森にいるとすれば
さらに奥――
column4: If she's in the forest, it must be further inside.

column3:
いや待て――
これはトロールの足跡！？
column4:
Wait, could it be...
These are the footprints of a Troll!?

column3:
はるか向こうまで続いているようだ
新しいぞ――？
column4:
It seems to continue far beyond. Is there
something new...?

column3: メイリーフ嬢はすでに！？
column4: Miss Mayleaf is already!?

column3: ここ、お友達のお墓なの――
column4: This is the grave of a friend...

column3:
わたしがもっと幼かった頃――
あの子も同い年で――
column4:
When I was younger...
That child was also the same age as me...

column3:
どこへ行くにも――
何をするのも一緒だった――
column4:
Wherever we go—
Whatever we do—it's together—

column3:
でも、あの子は――
大人になって――
column4:
But she—
She grew up—

column3: わたしを遠ざけるようになった――
column4: She started keeping her distance from me—

column3:
わたしがいつまでたっても
少女のままだったから――
column4: Because I will forever remain a young girl—

column3:
彼女となら
ずっと仲良くできると思っていたのに――
column4:
I thought I could always get along with her,
but...

column3: でも、無理だった――
column4: But, it was impossible――

column3:
結局、あの子は
わたしを遠ざけたまま――
column4: In the end, that child keeps me at a distance--

column3:
わたしを怪物扱いしたまま
自分はしわくちゃに老いて――
column4:
Continuing to treat me like a monster, I age,
becoming wrinkled...

column3: 死んでしまったの
column4: And then she died.

column3:
それ以来、人間とは
仲良くならないようにしてるんだ
column4:
Since then, I have been avoiding getting close to
humans.

column3:
いつも距離を置いて
お互い、つかず、離れず、ね
column4:
Always keeping a distance,
Neither too close nor too far, that's how we
should be, you know.

column3: あれ？
column4: Huh?

column3:
わたしが人間じゃないって
話したかな？
column4: Did I ever say that I'm not human?

column3: わたしは――エルフなの
column4: I am... an elf.

column3:
人間とは
生きている時間が違うの
column4: Humans have different lifespans—

column3:
あなたは――
あなたやレオやイリスは特別
column4: You are... You, Leo, and Iris are special.

column3: だって、覚者だからね
column4: Because you are Arisen.

column3: 覚者は心臓がなくて――
column4: An Arisen has no heart...

column3:
心臓が時を刻まないから――
年を取らないんだよね
column4:
Because the heart doesn't mark the passage of
time -
it doesn't age, you know.

column3: 仲良くしてね？
column4: Let's get along, okay?

column3:
わたしはゆっくりだけど
年を取る――
column4: I age slowly but surely—

column3: あなたたちは取らない――
column4: You shall not take them—

column3:
わたしの背が伸びて
胸がふくらんだり――
column4: My height has grown, and my chest has swelled...

column3:
腰が曲がって
お婆さんになったり――
column4: My back bends and I become an old lady.

column3: 全部、見ていてね
column4: Please watch everything.

column3:
はい――これで告白はお・わ・り
じゃあ、また、神殿で！
column4:
Yes... With this, the confession is o-ver.
Well then, I'll see you again at the Temple!

column3: 待ってくれよー！
column4: Wait for me!

column3:
はぁ――はぁ――
ジョゼフ様のご命令でね
column4:
Haa――haa――
By Lord Joseph's orders.

column3:
メイリーフを見つけて
仲良くなっておけって――
column4: Find Mayleaf and become friends ――

column3: ――なんだろうね、いったい
column4: I wonder what it is, exactly.
Ah!?

column3:
逃げた方がいいって！ 
キリがないぞ！？
column4: It's better to run away! There's no end to this!

column3: 誰かっ！　誰か助けて！
column4: Someone! Someone help!

column3: きみとは――二度目だな
column4: With you... it's the second time, isn't it?

column3:
そういえば
自己紹介がまだだった
column4: By the way, I forgot to introduce myself.

column3: ――キースヒルトだ
column4: ――It's Kieshildt.

column3: ふっ――
column4: Hmph...

column3:
我々の出会いは
いつも慌ただしいな
column4: Our encounters are always rushed.

column3: さて――
column4: Now then...

column3:
メイリーフの行方には
心当たりがある
column4: I have an idea about the whereabouts of Mayleaf.

column3:
あの子の保護は
僕に任せてくれ
column4: Please entrust the protection of that child to me.

column3:
彼女の身を案じることに
かけては――
column4: When it comes to worrying about her well-being...

column3: 僕の方が上だと自負している
column4: I take pride in believing that I am superior.

column3: きみは神殿に戻って――
column4: You should return to the Temple...

column3:
自陣の結束を
確認しておいた方がいい
column4:
It is advisable to confirm the unity of our own
formation.

column3:
人の繋がりなど――
脆いものだから
column4:
Human connections and the like—
They are fragile things.

column3:
ねえ、急いで神殿へ戻ろう
嫌な予感がする
column4:
Hey, let's hurry and return to the Temple.
I have a bad feeling.

column3:
――いや
嫌なものを見たっていうか――
column4:
- No... It's more like I saw something
unpleasant...

column3:
狙いはエルフだぞ！　いいな？
小さいぞ！　見逃すな！
column4:
The target is an elf, got it? Small one! Don't
let them escape!

column3: エルフ！　エルフ！
column4: Elf! Elf!

column3:
メイリーフ
俺から離れるな！
column4: Mayleaf, don't leave my side!

column3: 奴らは僕が引きつける
column4: I'll draw their attention.

column3: メイリーフを頼む
column4: Please ask Mayleaf.

column3: いや、敵は俺たちが引き受ける
column4: No, we will accept the enemy.

column3:
あんたみたいな優男に
あの大軍は無理だ
column4:
A delicate man like you can't handle that massive
army.

column3: エルフ！？
column4: An elf?!

column3: そう――ただの優男ではない
column4: So――he's not just a handsome man.

column3:
さあ、愚かなオークどもよ！
エルフの命欲しくば――いざ！
column4:
Now, foolish Orcs!
If you desire the lives of the Elves, then come
forth!

column3: 応援に行かないの？
column4: Don't you want to go and cheer them on?

column3:
エルフなら
うまく逃げ切るさ
column4:
If you're an elf, You'll be able to escape
successfully.

column3:
ただ今より、ここを最前線とする！
戦士たちよ！　退くな！　下がるな！
column4:
From this moment on, this place shall be the
forefront!
Soldiers, do not retreat! Do not step back!
Look...!?

column3:
なんだ？
何が起こっている！？
column4:
What's happening?
What's going on?!

column3: ほーら、こい、こい、こっちへこい！
column4: Come on, come on, come over here!

column3:
モゴック――エルフ野郎の居場所がわかった
エルテ・ディナンだ
column4:
Mogok... I found the whereabouts of that Elf
bastard.
It's Erte Deenan.

column3: ははっ！　ズールよ、そりゃいい
column4: Hahaha! Oh, Zuhl, that's good!

column3:
ろくでなしども！　引き上げるぞ！
エルテ・ディナンへ行く
column4: Rotten scoundrels! We're going to Erte Deenan!

column3:
ああ、ハインツ、丁度良かった
わたしを神殿まで連れて帰ってくれ
column4:
Ah, Heinz, just in time.
Please take me back to the Temple.

column3:
それはもちろん！
このわたしと――
column4:
Of course!
Together with me,─

column3: ローガンとデュークにお任せください
column4: Leave it to Logan and Duke.

column3:
世話になったな
年寄りの世話は終わりだ
column4:
I'm indebted to you.
My care for the elderly is over.

column3: では、神殿で会おう
column4: Then, let's meet at the temple.

column3: あれ？
column4: Huh?

column3: なんだか、久しぶりだね
column4: It's been a while, hasn't it?

column3:
一番最近会ったのはキノザ――
ううん、《禊の神殿》だ
column4:
The most recent one I met was in Kinoza—
No, it was in the "Temple of Purification".

column3: あの時は迷惑をかけちゃったな
column4: I caused you trouble back then.

column3:
いや、違うよね？
前回会ったのはアークの中だった
column4:
No, that's not right, is it?
The last time we met was inside the Ark.

column3:
あの時、あんたもいたよね？
レオと一緒に――
column4:
Back then, you were there too, right?
Together with Leo...

column3: ねえ、レオは？
column4: Hey, where's Leo?

column3:
そう――来てないんだ
え？　伝言？
column4: No... they haven't come yet. Huh? A message?

column3:
「命がけで身を隠せ」――か
うん、了解
column4: "Hide yourself at all costs" — Got it.

column3: じゃあ、こっちからもレオに伝えて
column4:
Well, then, let's also convey it to Leo from our
side.

column3: 「村に迷惑をかけたくないから山に隠れる」って
column4:
"I don't want to be a nuisance to the village, so
I'll hide in the mountains," is what you're
saying, right?

column3: ――ふう
column4: ――Phew

column3:
さて、わたし、行くよ
――神殿のみんなによろしく
column4:
Well, I'm off.
――Please give my regards to everyone at the
Temple.

column3: 始まりは、荒波を海岸に叩きつけた強い風
column4:
It all began with a strong wind that slammed the
rough waves onto the shore.

column3: 続いて水平線に現れた黒雲は、夜のとばりの如く
column4:
The black clouds that appeared on the horizon
continued, like a veil of night,

column3: レスタニアを覆い、重い雨で大地を穿った
column4:
Covering Lestania, it pierced the earth with
heavy rain.

column3: これほどの自然の猛威は白竜の記憶にもなかった
column4:
This level of natural devastation was not even
recorded in the White Dragon's memory.

column3: 人々は怖れ、おののき、祈った
column4: The people were afraid, trembling, and prayed.

column3: その祈りを知ってか知らずか――
column4:
Whether the White Dragon knew about those prayers
or not...

column3: 白竜は、覚者たちを神殿に集めるよう
column4:
The White Dragon commanded the Arisen to gather
in the temple.

column3: 神官に命じた
column4: Ordered by the priest.

column3: では、各自、割り当てに従い現地へ向かってくれ
column4:
Now, each of you, follow your assigned location
and go there.

column3: 状況の把握が目的だが、優先すべきは人命だ
column4:
Although the purpose is to assess the situation,
saving lives should be the priority.

column3: 我が使いたちよ

The brilliance exists to gaze upon the living

column4: Indeed, there is no choice but to board Phindym.

ゲートの向こう側へ渡り

column4:
Cross over to the other side of the gate and
eliminate the cause—

column3: しばらくの間、時間をください
column4: Please give me some time.

column3:
一方通行のこの、"ゲート"――
わたしの力で、必ず開きます
column4:
This one-way "gate"—
I will definitely open it with my power.

column3:
再び一つとなった覚者たちは
諸悪の根源と目された黒騎士を退けることに成功した
column4:
Once again, the Arisen have come together as one.
They have succeeded in repelling the Black
Knight, who was considered the root of all evil.

column3: しかし、侵食魔が跋扈する状況は、まだ変わらない
column4:
However, the situation where the Infected rampage
is still unchanged.

column3: フィンダム大陸へ渡る準備が粛々と進む中――
column4:
As preparations steadily progress for the journey
to the continent of Phindym...

column3: 覚者たちはひとときの安息を夢見た――
column4: The Arisen dream of a moment of respite...

column3: 準備ができました
column4: The preparations are complete.

column3:
クラウスが言うには――
中は、もの凄い力でねじ曲げられた空間か――
column4:
According to Klaus, the interior is a space that
has been bent with tremendous force.

column3:
離れた大地と大地が結ばれるほど
圧縮された空間か――
column4:
It's a space so compressed that distant lands and
ours are connected, right?

column3:
どっちにしても、安全なんか
これっぽちも保証されていないんです
column4:
Either way, there is no guarantee of safety
whatsoever.

column3: 今、言う？
column4: Should I say it now?

column3: これでお別れだったりして――
column4: This might be goodbye...

column3:
わたしは、一度通り抜けている
セシリーもな
column4: I have already passed through once, as has Cecily.

column3:
何かあっても、ちょっとばかり
記憶をなくす程度さ
column4:
Even if something were to happen, I'd only lose a
bit of my memory.

column3:
いつまでグダグダ言ってやがる
覚悟決めろ
column4:
Until when are you going to keep blabbering on?
Make up your mind and prepare yourself.

column3: ――ありがとうございます
column4: -Thank you very much.

column3: それでは――開きます――
column4: Well then - let's begin -

column3: 一体ここで何が起きているんだ？
column4: What on earth is happening here?

column3:
おい、見ろ！
この妖しく輝く礎を――
column4:
Hey, look!
Behold this mysteriously shining Keystone...

column3: はじめてみるな
column4: I've never seen this before.

column3: な、なんだ！？
column4: W-What is it!?

column3: うっ
column4: Ugh.

column3: あああああああ！
column4: Aaahhhhh!

column3: 斥候からの情報によると――
column4: According to the scout's report...

column3: 敵は二手に分かれて待ち受けているそうだ
column4: The enemy is waiting in two different locations.

column3: こちらも隊を二つに分け、迎え撃つ！
column4:
We will also divide the squad into two and
counter-attack!

column3: それぞれの場所まで案内しよう
column4:
I will guide you each to your respective
locations.

column3: 聞いての通りだ
column4: Just as you heard.

column3: 私の側から向かう者はついてこい
column4: Those who are going with me, follow.

column3: さぁ、出発するぞ！
column4: Now, let's depart!

column3: ただいま、フィンダム
column4: I'm back, Phindym.

column3:
みなさん、ようこそ
ここがわたしの故郷――フィンダムです
column4:
Everyone, welcome.
This is my home - Phindym.

column3:
フィンダムの芯なる樹――この世界の中心だ
でも、病んで、死にかけている
column4:
Phindym's Core Tree - The Center of this World.
However, it is sick and on the brink of death.

column3: うわ――
column4: Oh...

column3:
ここはわたしの故郷なんだ
かつてはナバド村と呼ばれていた
column4:
This is my hometown.
It used to be called the Village of Nabhadh.

column3:
子供の頃に流行病があって――
でも、フィンダムには対処法がなくてね
column4:
When I was a child, there was an epidemic...
But, there was no cure in Phindym.

column3: そもそも、病は、報いや罰だと考えられていたんだ
column4:
Originally, illness was thought of as retribution
or punishment.

column3:
ただ死を待つだけの日々――
人がバタバタと死んでいった
column4:
Just waiting for death every day, people died one
after another.

column3: やりきれない話だね
column4: It's a frustrating story.

column3: でも、フィンダムは変わりました
column4: However, Phindym has changed.

column3:
怯えて死を待つだけの時代に、父が終止符を
打ったのです
column4:
In an era where people merely awaited death in
fear, my father put an end to it.

column3:
今、父は"芯なる樹"を救うために奮闘しています
フィンダムの未来は明るい――そう信じています
column4:
Now, my father is struggling to save the "Core
Tree".
I believe that the future of Phindym is bright -
what I truly believe.

column3:
"芯なる樹"が腐るってのは、竜が病気に
なるようなものか？
column4:
Is it like the "Core Tree" is rotting, causing
the dragons to become sick?

column3:
"芯なる樹"と竜は不可分
だから、そう言っても、間違いではない
column4:
The "Core Tree" and the Dragon are inseparable.
So, saying that is not wrong.

column3:
腐敗の原因を作ったのは
どこからか現れた、あの黒騎士だ
column4:
The one who caused the corruption was none other
than that Black Knight.

column3:
黒騎士は倒したから、あとはどうやって
この世界を救うか――だね
column4:
Now that we've defeated the Black Knight, the
only thing left is how to save this world, right?

column3:
精霊竜ウィルミアと話さなくてはなりません
もちろん、父にも帰還を報告しないと――
column4:
I must speak with the Spirit Dragon Willmia.
Of course, I must also report my return to my
father...

column3:
おいおいなんだあれは！？
向かってくるぞ！
column4:
Oh, what is that!?
They're coming towards us!

column3: 竜――精霊竜ウィルミアです！
column4: Dragon - I am Spirit Dragon Willmia!

column3: 会いに来てくれるなんて！
column4: To think you came to see me!

column3: いや、様子がおかしい！
column4: No, something seems off!

column3: セシリー、逃げろ！
column4: Cecily, run!

column3: うわっー
column4: Wah!

column4: Wah!

column4: Wah!

column4: Wah!

column4: Wah!

column3:
セシリー！？
無事に戻ったというのは本当だったのだな
column4: Cecily!? So it was true that you returned safely.

column3: 一緒に来たってずーっと言ってるじゃねえかよ！
column4: You keep saying that you came together with me!

column3: この方は、レスタニアを護りし白竜の覚者です
column4:
This person is the Arisen of the White Dragon,
who protects Lestania.

column3: あれもレスタニアから来た覚者だと言っている
column4:
They also claim to be an Arisen who came from
Lestania.

column3:
遙か彼方にレスタニアなる大地があり、白き竜と
民が暮らしている
column4:
Far beyond, there is the land of Lestania where
the white dragon and its people live.

column3:
だが、竜と覚者は一対の契り
白き竜には幾人もの覚者がいるなどとは――
column4:
However, there are many Arisen who have formed a
bond with the White Dragon...

column3:
世界は、わたしたちの想像より、ずっと広くて
在り方も多様なのです
column4:
The world is much larger and more diverse
than we can imagine.

column3:
覚者になると同時に姿を消し――
戻って来たと思えば異国と、その覚者の話だ
column4:
Upon becoming an Arisen, they disappeared at the
same time - it's as if they vanished.
Then, when they returned, it was a story of a
foreign land and a new Arisen.

column3: 我らとておまえを信じたい
column4: We want to believe in you.

column3:
おまえたちの言葉が真実だと言うのならば
我らを納得させる、証を見せてほしい
column4:
If you claim that your words are the truth, then
please show us the proof that will convince us.

column3: 古来より伝わる方法で力とその正しさを示すのだ
column4:
Demonstrate your power and its righteousness
through the methods passed down since ancient
times.

column3: ホオオオオ――！！
column4: Hoooorrrggghhh!!

column3: ハアッ――ハアッ――フ―！！
column4: Haah... Haah... Huff...!!

column3: セヤッ！！
column4: Oh, yeah!!

column3: ハアッ―！！
column4: Haa!!

column3: これはこれはみなさん――
column4: Well, well, everyone――

column3: 目的は、これですか？
column4: Is this your goal?

column3:
冗談じゃない――
復讐を台無しにされてたまるか！
column4:
This is no joke—
I won't stand for my revenge being ruined!

column3:
腐った"芯なる樹"とともに
皆、朽ち果ててしまえ！
column4:
With the rotten "Core Tree", everyone, wither
away!

column3: あなたが――したの？
column4: Did you... do it?

column3:
ロイグ――
あなたが"芯なる樹"を――
column4:
Loeg――
you, the 'Core Tree'――

column3:
故郷が病魔に侵された時――
誰もが、これは理、運命だと、背を向けた
column4:
When our hometown is invaded by the disease,
everyone turned their backs, believing it to be
the order of fate.

column3: 竜も助けてはくれなかった
column4: Even the dragons did not come to help.

column3:
悲しいが、歯を食いしばるしかなかった
このフィンダムで育てば誰もがそうなる
column4:
It's sad, but we had no choice but to grit our
teeth.
Everyone in Phindym goes through the same.

column3:
しかし、苦しむ両親を見ているうちに
背を向けた人々が憎くなった
column4:
However, as I watched my suffering parents, I
began to despise those who turned their backs.

column3: 何もしない竜に失望した
column4: I was disappointed in the dragon that did nothing.

column3:
ほどなく父は気が触れて――
世を呪う言葉を残して死んだ
column4:
Before long, my father lost his sanity—
Leaving behind words cursing the world, he died.

column3: わたしはその言葉に囚われたのさ
column4: I became trapped by those words.

column3: 乞い、願っていると、手段が手に入った
column4:
I begged and wished, and a means came into my
hands.

column3:
ああ――
"芯なる樹"に毒素を植え付けてやった
column4:
Ah...
I implanted toxins into the "Core Tree".

column3: するとどうだ
column4: And then, what happened?

column3:
"芯なる樹"を救おうと、おまえたちは右往左往
死は理ではないのか？　運命ではなかったのか？
column4:
In your efforts to save the "Core Tree," you are
all in a state of confusion.
Is death not part of the order? Was it not meant
to be our destiny?

column3:
わかるぞ？
自分たちの命だけは惜しいんだろう？
column4:
Do you understand?
Are you only concerned about your own lives?

column3:
"理"など方便
身勝手な奴らめ
column4:
"Justice" and such are all just excuses, you
self-centered lot!

column3: ロイグ、レスタニアを思い出して？
column4: Loeg, do you remember Lestania?

column3: フィンダムも、あんなふうになれるかもしれない
column4: Phindym, too, could perhaps become like that.

column3: 無理だね
column4: It's impossible.

column3: わたしが全力で阻止するからな！
column4: I will do everything I can to stop you!

column3: ウォーウ、ウォウ、ウォウォウォーウ
column4: Woof, woof, woof-woof-woof!

column3:
魔物と化してもなおわたしを慕う
かわいいケモノたちよ――
column4:
Cute little creatures who still adore me even
when I've become a monster...

column3: さあ行け！
column4: Come on!

column3:
――なぜだ！　どういうことだ！？
黒騎士よ！　どこにいる！
column4:
Why! What is happening!?
Black Knight! Where are you?

column3: 今さらわたしを見捨てるのか！
column4: Are you abandoning me now, of all times!

column3:
ロイグが？
黒い霧に――！！
column4: Loeg? In the black mist--!!

column3: おい、近づくな！
column4: Hey, don't come any closer!

column3: そこ！　足元に――
column4: There! At your feet...

column3: 《原始の雫》！
column4: 《Primeval Drops》！

column3: まだ希望は消えていない――
column4: Hope is not yet extinguished...

column3: これで――フィンダムは救われます！
column4: With this, Phindym will be saved!

column3: 時が来たようだ
column4: It seems the time has come.

column3:
長く閉ざされていた"精霊の地"
芯なる樹の樹内へ通じる聖門を――
column4:
"The Spirit Land" that has long been sealed is a
sacred gate that leads into the inner part of the
"Core Tree"...

column3: その、選ばれし者が解き開く時が来たのだ
column4: The time has come for the chosen one to unlock it.

column3:
選ばれし者、即ち、覚者！
覚者、即ち、セシリー！
column4:
Chosen one, that is, Arisen!
Arisen, that is, Cecily!

column3: 大地、竜、人の未来はおまえに託された
column4:
The future of the land, dragons, and humanity is
entrusted to you.

column3:
わたしに――
できるでしょうか
column4: May I...?

column3: できるとも
column4: Indeed, it is possible.

column3: おまえには、心強い友がいるではないか
column4: You have a strong friend by your side, don't you?

column3:
精霊竜にも、わたしにもなかったものを
おまえは手に入れたのだ
column4:
You have obtained something that neither the
Spirit Dragon, nor I, have ever had.

column3: 隊長、そしてみなさん――
column4: Captain, and everyone—

column3:
このフィンダムを救うため
力を貸してください
column4: Please lend us your strength to save Phindym.

column3:
わたしと共に――
この大地に、最後の希望を灯すために――
column4:
With me—
To kindle the final hope in this land—

column3: どうか、よろしくお願いします
column4: Please, I'm counting on you.

column3:
フィンダムは毒に侵され――
病に倒れかけた大地だった
column4:
Phindym was poisoned, the land on the verge of
falling ill.

column3:
レスタニアから渡った覚者たちは
フィンダムの覚者を助け、戦い――
column4:
Arisen who ventured from Lestania came to fight
alongside Arisen of Phindym.

column3: ついに、大地を癒やす手段を手に入れた
column4: Finally, they obtained a means to heal the land.

column3: そしてフィンダムの未来を託されし覚者――
column4:
And thus, the Arisen entrusted with the future of
Phindym—

column3:
セシリーは《原始の雫》について学び
やがて来る、治療の時を待った
column4:
Cecily learned about the "Primeval Drops" and
waited for the moment of healing to come.

column3:
我々が"精霊の地"と呼んでいるこの先の
土地について説明しておこう
column4:
Let me describe the land beyond, that we call
"The Spirit Land".

column3:
"精霊の地"とは芯なる樹へと続く、樹層一帯
自由に出入りできるのは竜だけだ
column4:
The "Spirit Land" is the area around the
surrounding the Core Tree, which extends to the
canopy.
Only dragons can enter and leave freely.

column3:
我々が出入りするあの門も
普段は、固く閉じてある
column4:
That gate where we enter and exit is usually
tightly sealed.

column3: 知っての通り――
column4: As you know...

column3:
芯なる樹は、いまやフィンダム全域に
毒素を送り出す病巣――
column4:
The Core Tree has become an infected hive that
sends toxins throughout Phindym.

column3:
治療のためには樹の中心まで
行かねばならない
column4:
In order to cure it, we must go to the center of
the Tree.

column3:
毒によって侵された根は
この《原始の雫》で浄化できるだろう
column4:
The roots that have been infested with poison can
be purified with these "Primeval Drops."

column3:
おそらく樹内は
魔物の巣窟となっているはず――
column4: Perhaps the tree is a nest of monsters.

column3:
隊長、あなたは先行して魔物を排除し
樹の中心を目指して欲しい
column4:
Captain, I want you to go ahead and eliminate the
enemies and head for the center of the Tree.

column3: 道中の安全を確保する大切な役割ですね
column4:
Ensuring safety along the way is an important
role.

column3: 掃除かあ、嫌いなんだけどなあ
column4: Cleaning. Oh, I hate it.

column3:
わたしも、後を追い
樹内での手助けをいたそう
column4: I'll follow after and assist you inside the tree.

column3:
《原始の雫》 が手に入ることは二度とない
頼り続けで心苦しいが、よろしく頼む
column4:
We may never get another chance to obtain the
"Primeval Drops."
I'm sorry I keep asking you for help, but I'm
counting on you.

column3: 精霊竜ウィルミアだ
column4: It's Spirit Dragon Willmia.

column3:
竜はもう、かつての竜ではない
残念ながら――
column4:
The Dragon isn't what it used to be...
Unfortunately--

column3: 我々は間に合わなかったのだ
column4: We didn't make it in time.

column3: 覚者よ、白竜の覚者よ
column4: Oh, Arisen, Arisen of the White Dragon.

column3: 頼もしくなりましたね
column4: You have become reliable, haven't you?

column3: 精霊竜の継承、大変にごくろうさまでした
column4:
Thank you very much for your hard work in
inheriting the Spirit Dragon.

column3:
精霊竜が、竜としての理を取り戻したことで
レスタニアの危機は回避されました
column4:
The Spirit Dragon, regaining its draconic
essence, averted the crisis in Lestania.

column3:
しかし、白竜がまだ回復の途上にあることを
思うと――油断は禁物です
column4:
However, I think that the White Dragon is still
in the process of recovering - you can never let
your guard down!

column3:
世界は五大竜と呼ばれる竜たちによって
守られています
column4:
The world is protected by the dragons known as
the Five Great Dragons.

column3: 白竜、精霊竜、そして黒竜――
column4:
The White Dragon, the Spirit Dragon, and the
Black Dragon...

column3:
黒き竜の、闇で蠢く思惑の断片に
あなたも、触れたはずです
column4:
You, too, must have been touched by the fragments
of the black dragon's thoughts stirring in the
darkness.

column3:
残りの二竜も
ほどなく、あなたは知ることになるでしょう
column4:
The remaining two dragons will also soon become
known to you.

column3: レスタニアの、本当の危機はこれからです
column4: The true crisis of Lestania is yet to come.

column3:
強くなりなさい
そう、レオのように――
column4:
Be strong.
Yes, like Leo!

column3: 交わることを禁じられた大陸が――
column4: The continents that were forbidden to intersect...

column3: ――異なる竜の大陸がレスタニアで交差した
column4:
...the continents of different dragons
intersected in Lestania.

column3: 竜たちですら気づいていなかったが――
column4: Even the dragons didn't realize it, but--

column3:
世界は、その瞬間、理という鋳型から
取り出されたのだ
column4:
The world was taken out of the mold of reason at
that moment.

column3:
はて――それはいったい誰の仕業だろうか
何を望んだ結果なのだろうか
column4:
Huh... who could have done such a thing?
And what did they want to achieve?

column3:
時にレスタニア歴、３２４年
竜の理を解く、物語は動きだした
column4:
In the year 324 of the Lestania Era, the tale of
unraveling the dragon's order began to unfold.

column3: 見て、あそこ！　空に黒い渦ができてる！
column4:
Look, over there! A black vortex is forming in
the sky!

column3:
何かが――ああ、大地の竜力が
吸い上げられているようです！
column4:
Something... oh, the very Dragon Force of the
land seems to be being drained!

column3: おいおいおい！
column4: Hey hey hey!

column3: 急いでガラダの元へ向かうぞ！
column4: Hurry, let's head to Gearóid's location!

column3: 敵襲！　戦闘態勢！
column4: Enemy attack! Battle formation!

column3: みんな、こっちだ！
column4: Everyone, this way!

column3: おい、時間を稼ぐぞ！
column4: Hey, let's stall for time!

column3:
やはり以前より状況は悪化しているようだ
魔物がより凶暴になっている
column4:
The situation is getting worse than before.
The monsters seem even more ferocious.

column3: この森のどこかに、礎があるはずなんだ
column4:
There should be a portcrystal somewhere in this
forest.

column3:
レスタニアの礎と同じ力を持つものだ
手分けして探そう
column4:
They possess the same power as that of the
Keystone of Lestania.
Let's split up and search.

column3: あれ、礎じゃない？
column4: Oh, is that not a Portcrystal?

column3: これこれ、いつもの、この感じ！
column4: This is it, the usual, this feeling!

column3: リムを使って行き来できるってことだよね？
column4:
Using Rift Crystals allows us to travel back and
forth, right?

column3: 隊長、あそこに入り口が！
column4: Captain, there's an entrance over there!

column3:
セシリー！？
ああ、無事で良かった！
column4:
Cecily!?
Ah, I'm glad you're safe!

column3: どこにいたんだ！？
column4: Where were you!?

column3: 心配かけてごめんなさい
column4: I'm sorry for worrying you.

column3:
――お父さんはどこですか？
ロイグは戻ってる？
column4:
Where is your father?
Is Loeg back?

column3: ロイグの行方はわからないが――
column4: We don't know Loeg's whereabouts, but――

column3:
ガラダは"芯なる樹"の治療薬、《原始の雫》を求め
三人の戦士とともに、魔の峡谷へと旅立った
column4:
Gearóid and three soldiers set out for the demons
canyon in search of the "Primeval Drop", the cure
for the "Core Tree".

column3: たった四人で！？
column4: Just four people?!

column3: わたしも行かなくちゃ！
column4: I have to go too!

column3: 気持ちはわかるぞ、セシリー
column4: I understand how you feel, Cecily.

column3:
だが、ガラダに同行したのは屈強の戦士たち
もう少し、信頼してやれ
column4:
But the soldiers who accompanied Gearóid are
strong and reliable.
Trust them a bit more.

column3: 見たところ、お連れさんも疲れているようだ
column4:
From what I can see, it seems like your companion
is also tired, Ser.

column3:
故郷を素通りさせてしまってはガラダに
会わせる顔がない
column4:
I can't face letting Gearóid
see me if I let her pass by my hometown unnoticed.

column3:
わたし――
ここからの眺めが、大好きなんです
column4:
This view from here...
I just love it.

column3:
夜明け前、朝、雨の日、夕方、月明かりの夜――
色々な姿を見せてくれます
column4:
Before dawn, in the morning, on a rainy day, in
the evening, on a moonlit night...
The view changes to show many forms.

column3:
覚者に選ばれた時
誇らしくもあったけど、本当は不安でした
column4:
When I was chosen to be Arisen, I felt proud, but
really anxious.

column3:
託された期待や希望に応えられるのかな？
もう――押し潰されそうでした
column4:
Would I be able to live up to the expectations
and hopes entrusted to me?
I was already--I was about to be crushed.

column3: でも、レスタニアであなたたちと過ごすうちに――
column4:
But, while spending time with all of you in
Lestania...

column3:
覚者の生き方が
ひとつじゃないことを知りました
column4:
I realized that being Arisen doesn't mean having
just one way of life.

column3:
みんなが、それぞれの大切なものを守るため
がんばって、歩いている
column4:
Everyone is doing their best to protect what is
important to each of us.

column3: しっかり、一歩、一歩
column4: Steady, step by step

column3: わたしも、それでいいんだって
column4: I realized, that's enough for me.

column3: 隊長？　ありがとう――
column4: Captain? Thank you—

column3: わたし
column4: I—

column3: もう迷いません
column4: I won't hesitate anymore.

column3: 大地が侵食されたせいなのか――
column4: Is it because the land has been corrupted...

column3: このあたりも、殺気立った魔物が多いですね
column4:
There are a lot of hostile creatures around here,
aren't there?

column3: ああ、さっきのも、そんな感じだった
column4: Ah, it felt like that earlier too.

column3: ちょっと、ちょっと――
column4: Hey, wait a minute—

column3: あれ！
column4: Oh!

column3: やばくない！？
column4: Isn't it dangerous!?

column3: あれがダナ村に突っ込んだら――
column4: If that thing charges into Dana Village—

column3: 大惨事になりますよ！！
column4: It will be a huge disaster!!

column3:
おい、隊長とダナ村に連絡だ！
それとセシリーの親父さんにもな
column4:
Hey, contact the captain and Dana Village!
Also, let Cecily's father know!

column3: 隊長ッ！
column4: Captain!

column3: 隊長ぉ――！　こっち！
column4: Captain, over here! This way!

column3: 暴走が始まりやがった
column4: It's starting to go out of control.

column3:
リズ、エリオット！
雑魚は俺たちで相手するぞ
column4:
Lise, Elliot!
We'll take care of the weaker enemies.

column3: 隊長、アイツを頼んだぜ！
column4: Captain, take care of that one!

column3: え？　ええっ！？
column4: Huh? Eh?

column3: し、死んでますよ、大勢死んでます
column4: They're dead... They're all dead.

column3: 世の末って、戦場のこと！？
column4: The end of the world is a battlefield!?

column3: どこの戦場だよ！　全部終わっただろうが
column4:
Which battlefield? Everything is already over,
isn't it?

column3: オーク戦争に逆戻り！？
column4: Back to the Orc War!?

column3:
落ち着こう
わたしたち、オークならお手のもの
column4:
Calm down.
We can handle the Orcs.

column3: あっちからも！　数が増えてます！
column4: From over there, too!　The numbers are growing!

column3: おい隊長、指示はねえのか！
column4: Hey, Captain, what are the orders?!

column3: こっち
column4: This way

column3: だ、だれ！？
column4: Who is it?!

column3: 今、重要？　死にたい？
column4: Is it important right now? Do you want to die?

column3: どこへ行くの？
column4: Where are you going?

column3: いいから走って！
column4: Just run!

column3: ここで迎撃！
column4: We'll intercept them here!

column3: ふんっ（リアクションボイス）
column4: *Hmph*

column3: よし！（リアクションボイス）
column4: Alright! (Reaction voice)

column3: ふぅ――（リアクションボイス）
column4: Phew... (Reaction voice)

column3: うまくいったみたい
column4: It seems to have gone well.

column3: 見ない顔だね――
column4: You have an unfamiliar face--

column3: わたしはジリアン
column4: I am Gillian.

column3: ジリアン、急げ！
column4: Gillian, hurry!

column3: 見つかれば次はない！
column4: If found, there will be no next time!

column3: クインタス、今行く！
column4: Go!

column3: 付いてきて
column4: Follow me.

column3:
おい、そろそろ教えろ
ここはどこだ？　どこへ行く？
column4:
Hey, it's about time you told me.
Where are we?　Where are we going?

column3: 質問されるのって、うれしいものだね
column4: Being asked a question is a happy thing.

column3: 最近は、誰も――何も訊いてくれない
column4: Recently, no one - no one asks anything anymore.

column3:
答えを知っても、この世の中が
変わるわけじゃないから――
column4: Knowing the answer won't change the world, so...

column3: 顔を上げて、前を見つめる力を――
column4: The power to lift one's head and gaze ahead――

column3: あの山で燃える炎が焼き尽くしてしまったんだ
column4:
The flames that burned on that mountain have
completely consumed it.

column3: これで信じてもらえた？
column4: Do you believe me now?

column3: 全員が覚者だってことだけは信じてもいい
column4: It's fine to believe that everyone is an Arisen.

column3:
じゃあ、次はこっちの番
この世界のこと、教えてくれる？
column4:
Okay, now it's our turn.
Can you tell me about this world?

column3:
ここはアッカーシェラン大陸
火竜様とアッカー王家が統べる地――
column4:
This is the continent of Acre Selund, where the
Fire Dragon and the Acre Royal Family reign...

column3: なぜオークと戦っている？　戦争か？
column4: Why fight against the Orcs? Is it a war?

column3:
戦争――
いや、もっと一方的だ、狩りに近い
column4:
War...
No, it's more one-sided, like a hunt.

column3: ある日突然黒き竜が現れ、火竜様に襲いかかった
column4:
One day, a black dragon suddenly appeared and
attacked the Fire Dragon.

column3:
覚者だったクレス女王は火竜様となって
まだ間もなく――
column4:
Queen Cress, previously an Arisen, took on the
form of the Fire Dragon and, not long after...

column3: あっというまに決着がつき、火竜様は敗れ――
column4:
In no time, the battle was settled, and the Fire
Dragon was defeated.

column3: 代わりに悪しき竜が生まれた
column4: In its place, the Evil Dragon was born.

column3: 大地は焼かれ、城も落ち――
column4: The land is scorched, the castle falls—

column3:
鋼で武装したオーク達により
王国は蹂躙された
column4: The kingdom was ravaged by Orcs, armed with steel.

column3:
人々は、生きのびても
もう希望はないと思っている――
column4:
Even if some of the people survive, they feel
that there's no hope left.

column3: この大地を覆っているのは、絶望
column4: Despair is what covers this land.

column3: 厳しいですね
column4: It's tough, isn't it.

column3:
隊長、一度レスタニアに戻って相談しませんか？
俺たちにできることが何かあるかもしれません
column4:
Captain, why don't we go back to Lestania and
discuss this?
Maybe there is something we can do.

column3: 残念だが――
column4: Unfortunately--

column3: それは出来ない
column4: It cannot be done

column3: なに！？
column4: What!?

column3:
悪しき竜は、レスタニアにも現れ
あなたたちをここへ連れてきた――
column4:
The evil dragon also appeared in Lestania and
brought you all here--

column3:
もしかして疑ってる？
わたしたちが悪しき竜に送り込まれたとか？
column4:
Do you suspect that we were sent by The Evil
Dragon?

column3: うん
column4: Yeah.

column3:
そうだな――
人質を残せば、帰還を認めよう
column4:
Well then.
If you leave a hostage behind, I shall allow your
return.

column3: てめぇ――
column4: You—

column3: 俺が――残ります
column4: I'll--I'll stay.

column3:
隊長、行ってください
神殿の様子も気になりますよね？
column4:
Captain, please go ahead. You're also wondering
about the situation at the Temple, right?

column3: 俺なら大丈夫ですから
column4: I'll be fine.

column3:
覚者が大勢いるということは
ひとりひとりの価値は下がるよね
column4:
The fact that there are so many Arisen means that
each one is worth less.

column3: そんなことはないけど――何が言いたいの？
column4: I don't think so, but - what's your point?

column3: あの隊長って人、あなたを見捨てるかも？
column4: That captain, he might abandon you, you know?

column3: それはない
column4: That won't happen.

column3: 即答なんだ
column4: I can answer quickly.

column3: 俺は隊長を知ってるからね
column4: Because I know the captain.

column3:
他人への期待や信頼は自分を傷つけるよ
深く、深くね
column4:
Your expectations and trust in others will hurt
you deeply.

column3: ――何があったの？
column4: --What happened?

column3: ジリアン、朗報だ
column4: Gillian, good news.

column3:
オークどもに捕まった仲間の居場所を突き止めた！
どうする！？
column4:
We have located our friends who were captured by
the orcs!
What are we going to do?!

column3:
どうするって、決まってるでしょ
部隊の人選は任せて
column4:
What are you going to do? It's obvious.
I'll pick out the guys for the unit.

column3: 隊長！
column4: Captain!

column3: わたしたちも行く
column4: We'll go too.

column3: ま、その代わり、そいつは返してもらうぜ
column4:
Well, in exchange, I'm going to ask you to give
it back.

column3: 分かった――
column4: Understood—

column3: あれ？　意外とあっさり
column4: Oh? Surprisingly easy.

column3: 勘違いしないで
column4: Don't get me wrong.

column3:
ここには非戦闘員もいるから
あなたたちを残しておきたくないだけ
column4:
There are non-combatants here, so I just don't
want to leave you all behind.

column3: よっし！
column4: Alright!

column3:
隊長、今のが最後の敵兵です！
俺たち、やりましたね！
column4:
Captain, the one we just faced is the last enemy
soldier!
We did it!

column3: おかげで仲間は無事だ
column4: Thanks to that, my comrades are safe.

column3: みんな、疲れてるのかな
column4: I guess everyone is tired.

column3: 解放されたからと言って未来があるわけじゃないもの
column4:
Just because we're liberated, it doesn't mean
there's a future.

column3:
敵の増援が来るかもしれないから
あなたたち、よく見ていてね
column4:
Enemy reinforcements may be on the way.
You guys keep a close watch.

column3: ジリアン！？
column4: Gillian!?

column3: ケガをしている人は、治療を受けて
column4: Anyone who's injured, get treated immediately.

column3: すぐに移動するからね、それまで休んでおいて
column4: We'll be moving soon, so rest until then.

column3: ここにはいない――か――
column4: He's not here... or... is he?

column3: 誰か探してるのか？
column4: Looking for someone?

column3: 探しているのは、希望――
column4: What I'm looking for is hope...

column3: 敵軍、来る！　戦車も来るぞ！
column4:
Enemy troops, they're coming! Tanks are coming
too!

column3: 戦車！？
column4: Tanks!?

column3:
ダメだ、みんな疲れ切っている
急いで引き上げよう
column4:
It's not good, we're all exhausted.
Let's hurry up and pull out.

column3: ガハ！　もう、ヒトはおらぬか
column4: Gahaha! Are there no more humans here?

column3: オークの声だ――気をつけて
column4: It's the voice of the orcs... be careful.

column3: 火竜が死んでから、ヒトはフヌケ
column4:
Ever since the Fire Dragon died, people became
complacent.
